title: Game isn't loading for me and my mates in the game, hasn't started at all for any.
body:
so I get an error saying I have DirectX issues, after a black screen. been an hour since it started and I msg my friend on skype. he replies "You too? Bro this has never happened to me, was just chatting with my mate who also told me this happened. I reccon his on the enemy team since we started at the same time, not sure though". I've reset my pc and it still comes up, and whenever I try to play it the riot logo at the hidden icons "at the windows 7 taskbar" is missing and comes back whenever I end the process via start task.

this is a game breaking glitch and may have gotten me a leaver buster ban if an enemy managed to get in somehow.

replies.body:
"UPDATE" The game ended with a victory, they got in but I still couldn't get in at the end but my mates didn't update me after a bit and managed to win with a victory
it didn't count me as leaver buster or out of game so idk
